content: working through all 4 loops at the front and back of the work to close the top of the arm 3sts fasten_off and hide loose ends you will crochet the arms onto the body on round 26 of the body legs make 2 each leg is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from the foot up you will need a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts move the marker up to the first stitch of the next round after finishing the previous one round 1 magic_ring ch1 not at st work 5sc 5sts round 2 work 2sc in each st around 10sts round 3 *single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st repeat from * around 15sts round 4 *single_crochet in each of next 2sts 2sc in next st repeat from * around 20sts round 5 single_crochet into the back loop only of each st around 20sts rnds 6 & 7 single_crochet in each st around 20sts invisible single_crochet decrease it is very important that you follow this way of decreasing if your decreases look at all lumpy when you work them please make sure to check your method of working them and/or watch the video because they should be practically invisible ☺ insert hook in front loop only of first st insert hook in front loop only of second st 3 lps on hook yo and draw through 2 lps yo and complete single_crochet as normal click here for to watch a youtube video that shows this method useful from 1min 48 in round 8 single_crochet in each of the next 7sts decrease x 3 single_crochet in each of the remaining 7sts 17sts round 9 single_crochet in each of the next 6sts decrease single_crochet in the next st decrease single_crochet in each of the remaining 6sts 15sts round 10-14 single_crochet in each st around 15sts fasten_off first leg but not on second you should be at the back of this leg continue as follows… stuff the feet firmly and the legs a little lighter for now if you need help with this next part please see this video on how to join the legs on the weebee and friends youtube channel the stitch counts in the video are different as they are for the ~ 7 ~ standard size weebee doll but the way that the legs are joined works in exactly the same way round 15 single_crochet in each of the first ^^4sts then take other leg and place it next to the first so that both feet are facing the same way then single_crochet into the last st on the fastened off leg continue to single_crochet in each of the remaining 14sts around this leg and then single_crochet in each of the remaining 11sts around the first leg 30sts ^^please feel free to work more or less single_crochet at the start of round 15 to reach the side of the leg and to single_crochet into whichever st feels
